entries.meaning: A fool or idiot (especially as an ironic way of referring to oneself).
examples: I suppose muggins here will have to do all the work, as usual.

entries.meaning: (cribbage) The act of stealing another player's points because they either mispegged or counted up incorrectly.
(uncountable) A game of dominoes in which the object is to make the sum of the two ends of the line some multiple of five.
(uncountable) A card game based on building in suits or matching exposed cards, the object being to get rid of one's cards.
